item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Maureen Medved
item.description: "One day you fall for this boy. And he touches you with his fingers. And he burns holes in your skin with his mouth. And it hurts when you look at him. And it hurts when you don’t. And it feels like someone’s cut you open with a jagged piece of glass." -- Maureen Medved

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "I’m not brave any more darling. I’m all broken. They’ve broken me." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "There are few people whom I really love, and still fewer of whom I think well. The more I see of the world, the more am I dissatisfied with it; and every day confirms my belief of the inconsistency of all human characters, and of the little dependence that can be placed on the appearance of merit or sense." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "You pierce my soul. I am half agony, half hope...I have loved none but you." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "Would it save you a lot of time if I just gave up and went mad now?" -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I was never really insane except upon occasions when my heart was touched." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "Time is an illusion. Lunchtime doubly so." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "Another belief of mine: that everyone else my age is an adult, whereas I am merely in disguise." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The Very first moment I beheld him, my heart was irrevocably gone." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "If I had a flower for every time I thought of you...I could walk through my garden forever." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Mineko Iwasaki
item.description: "Stab the body and it heals, but injure the heart and the wound lasts a lifetime." -- Mineko Iwasaki

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Fernando Pessoa
item.description: "If I write what I feel, it's to reduce the fever of feeling. What I confess is unimportant, because everything is unimportant." -- Fernando Pessoa

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Profound desire, true desire is the desire to be close to someone." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by J
item.description: "Nothing makes a room feel emptier than wanting someone in it." -- J

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Write it. Shoot it. Publish it. Crochet it, sauté it, whatever. MAKE." -- Joss Whedon
